transArray.content: The service is very good. I will book this hotel again in the future.

Hello dear guest! Thank you for your recognition of the service attitude of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. I am very sad that I did not receive your full 5-star review! If life is a journey, we are willing to be your warmest site. If meeting is a ballad, we are willing to be a happy note for you. I want you to write your mood in notes. Friends, we look forward to meeting you next time in Orange. Beijing Wukesong Hotel, I wish you all the best! Manager: Zhao Dan
